caption.p: The principle component analysis (PCA) scatter plot with all samples based on 16 components from the EO with principle vectors; M1: Satureja montana from the mountain region; M2: Satureja montana from the coastal region; K: S. kitaibelii; S1: S. subspicata subsp. liburnica; S2: S. subspicata subsp. subspicata; ■: Calyx; □: Corolla; •: Leaf; ◯: Herba.
